long_description: Designed for international adventurers, the self-contained First Need Trav-L-Pure water purifier can be filled from a sink or pitcher, making it ideal for travel. Quick and convenient-no dangling hoses to contend with, no chemicals, no hold time or back-washing maintenance. Safely removes microbiological, chemical and aesthetic contaminants with its unique chemical-free purification process. Comfortable ergonomic pump handle with double-action pump supplies more water with less work. Easy, pour-through pre-screens remove larger contaminants. Particle retention 0.1 micron (normal), 0.4 (absolute); can purify up to 125 gal. of water (dependant on water source). A water-tight cap and padded Cordura(R) nylon carrying case make this filter easy to carry anywhere. Replacement First Need Trav-L-Pure water purifier canisters are sold separately.
